en: Thou shalt not take up a false report: put not thy hand with the wicked to be an unrighteous witness.
hmr: “Thuthang indiknaw chu hril dar naw la, hrietpuitu felnaw ni dingin mi rilo inthlawppui naw rawh.

en: Thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil; neither shalt thou speak in a cause to turn aside after a multitude to wrest justice:
hmr: Thil suol thaw dingin mipui chu i zui ding a ni nawh a; indikna keikâwi dinga mi tamna tieng tienga ṭhangin thubuoiah hrietpuitu i ni ding a ni bawk nawh;

en: neither shalt thou favor a poor man in his cause.
hmr: mi pasie khawm chu a thubuoiah i ditsak bîk ding a ni nawh.

en: If thou meet thine enemy’s ox or his ass going astray, thou shalt surely bring it back to him again.
hmr: “I hmêlma bâwngchal amanih, sabengtung fe hmang ding în tuokpui chun, ama kuomah i hung ṭhuoi kîr ngei ding a nih.

en: If thou see the ass of him that hateth thee lying under his burden, thou shalt forbear to leave him, thou shalt surely release it with him.
hmr: Nangma theidatu che sa- bengtung chu a phurrik hnuoia zâlin, insuo dinga i ṭhangpui ṭul a ni chun, ama chu în suopui ngei ding a nih.

en: Thou shalt not wrest the justice due to thy poor in his cause.
hmr: “I mi pasie thubuoi rêlnaah indikna în hmang ding a ni nawh.

en: Keep thee far from a false matter; and the innocent and righteous slay thou not: for I will not justify the wicked.
hmr: Hêkna indik nawa inthawk chu insiekieng dai la, pawitâwklo le mi fel chu that naw rawh, a thiemnaw chu thiem kân changtir âwm si nawh a.

en: And thou shalt take no bribe: for a bribe blindeth them that have sight, and perverteth the words of the righteous.
hmr: Chun, thamna i lâk ding a ni nawh, thamna chun hmutheina nei- hai khawm an mit a sukdel a, mi fel thuhai khawm a keikâwi hlak sih a.

en: And a sojourner shalt thou not oppress: for ye know the heart of a sojourner, seeing ye were sojourners in the land of Egypt.
hmr: Hnam dang chu i nêksâwr ding a ni nawh; nangni khawm Aigupta ramah hnam dang in ni kha hrein, hnam dang lungril chu in hriet sih a.

en: And six years thou shalt sow thy land, and shalt gather in the increase thereof:
hmr: “Kum ruk sûng chu i ramah chi tûng i ta, chu sûng chun a rahai chu la khâwm i tih;

en: but the seventh year thou shalt let it rest and lie fallow; that the poor of thy people may eat: and what they leave the beast of the field shall eat. In like manner thou shalt deal with thy vineyard, and with thy oliveyard.
hmr: kum sarinaa ruok chun in- châwltirin inumtir ṭawk ṭawk i tih, i mi pasiehaiin an fâk theina dingin le, an mâksanhai chu ramsahaiin an fâk theina dingin. Chuong ang bawkin, i grêp huonhai le i oliv huonhai chu thâwng i tih.

en: Six days thou shalt do thy work, and on the seventh day thou shalt rest; that thine ox and thine ass may have rest, and the son of thy handmaid, and the sojourner, may be refreshed.
hmr: Ni ruk sûng chu i sin thâwng i ta, ni sari ni ruok chun i bâwngchal le i sabengtung khawm chu an sâwldam theina ding le, i ina pieng i siehlawnu naupa le hnam dang mi khawm chu an insukhar theina dingin i châwl ding a nih.

en: And in all things that I have said unto you take ye heed: and make no mention of the name of other gods, neither let it be heard out of thy mouth.
hmr: I kuoma ka hril ta po po hi pawisa la, pathien danghai hming hrim chu lam naw la, i baua inthawkin hriet khawm ni bawk naw raw se.

en: Three times thou shalt keep a feast unto me in the year.
hmr: “Kum khat sûngin ka kuomah ruoiṭhena ṭum thum i nei ding a nih.

en: The feast of unleavened bread shalt thou keep: seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread, as I commanded thee, at the time appointed in the month Abib (for in it thou camest out from Egypt); and none shall appear before me empty:
hmr: Chawl ṭhanglo bei ruoi i nei ding a na, ni sari sûng chawl ṭhanglo bei fâng i ta, thu ka pêk ang cheha, Abib thlaha hun ka ruotpêk che huna khan (chu thla chun Aiguptaa inthawkin i hung suok a ni sih a) chun, tukhawm ka hmaah kut ruokin an hung inlang ding an nawh.

en: and the feast of harvest, the first-fruits of thy labors, which thou sowest in the field: and the feast of ingathering, at the end of the year, when thou gatherest in thy labors out of the field.
hmr: Loa i chîng i sininrimna ra hmasahai sîk hunah Busîk ruoi le, kum tâwpah loa inthawka i sinthaw rahai po po i lâk khâwm vawng pha Pâwltlâk ruoi i nei bawk ding a nih.

en: Three times in the year all thy males shall appear before the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Kum khatah ṭum thum pasal po po LALPA Pathien hmaah an hung inlang ding a nih.

en: Thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leavened bread; neither shall the fat of my feast remain all night until the morning.
hmr: “Ka inthâwina thisen chu chawl ṭhang leh în hlân ding a ni nawh a; ka ruoiṭhena sathâu chu zânkhawvâr, zîngkâr chenin a um zing ding a ni bawk nawh.

en: The first of the first-fruits of thy ground thou shalt bring into the house of Jehovah thy God. Thou shalt not boil a kid in its mother’s milk.
hmr: I hnuoi ra hmasatak laia a ṭha tak chu LALPA i Pathien ina chun i hung lâk ding a nih. Kêlte chu a pui nênetuiah i suong ding a ni nawh.

en: Behold, I send an angel before thee, to keep thee by the way, and to bring thee into the place which I have prepared.
hmr: “Ngai ta, i lampuia enkawl ding che le, hmun ka buotsaia chun ṭhuoi ding chein i hmaah vântirko ka tir a nih.

en: Take ye heed before him, and hearken unto his voice; provoke him not; for he will not pardon your transgression: for my name is in him.
hmr: Ama chu pawisa unla, a râwl chu ngai unla, suklungsen naw ro; ka hming chu amaa chun a um a, in bawsietnahai chu a ngaidam naw ding cheu a ni sih a.

en: But if thou shalt indeed hearken unto his voice, and do all that I speak; then I will be an enemy unto thine enemies, and an adversary unto thine adversaries.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ama râwl chu i ngai tak tak a, ka hril po po hi i thaw chun, i hmêlmahai ta dingin hmêlma nîng ka ta, i khingpuihai ta dingin an khingpui nîng ka tih.

en: For mine angel shall go before thee, and bring thee in unto the Amorite, and the Hittite, and the Perizzite, and the Canaanite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite: and I will cut them off.
hmr: Ka vântirko chu i hmaah fêng a ta, Amor mihai le, Hit mihai le, Periz mihai le, Kanaan mihai le, Hiv mihai le, Jebus mihai rama chun ṭhuoi lût a ti che; chun, anni chu tan thlâng ka tih.

en: Thou shalt not bow down to their gods, nor serve them, nor do after their works; but thou shalt utterly overthrow them, and break in pieces their pillars.
hmr: An pathienhai kuoma chun i kûn ding a ni nawh a, an rawng khawm i bâwl ding a ni nawh a, an sin i thaw ding a ni bawk nawh; anni chu peithla letdêr i ta, an milimhai chu suknâwi vawng i tih.

en: And ye shall serve Jehovah your God, and he will bless thy bread, and thy water; and I will take sickness away from the midst of thee.
hmr: LALPA i Pathien rawng chu bâwl i ta, i tui le beia khawm mal sâwmpêk ka ti che; chun, nangmaa inthawkin natnahai chu la hmang bawk ka tih.

en: There shall none cast her young, nor be barren, in thy land: the number of thy days I will fulfil.
hmr: “I ram sûngah ching le mâni nau ṭhe tukhawm um naw ni hai a, i dam sûng nihai chu sukkim ka tih.

en: I will send my terror before thee, and will discomfit all the people to whom thou shalt come, and I will make all thine enemies turn their backs unto thee.
hmr: Ka ṭitumna chu i hmaah tir ka ta, mi an kuoma i hungna dinghai chu sukbohmang ka ta, i hmêlmahai chu hnung innghat ding chein siem ka tih.

en: And I will send the hornet before thee, which shall drive out the Hivite, the Canaanite, and the Hittite, from before thee.
hmr: I hmaah khuoi tûrnei tir ka ta, chuongchun, Hiv mihai, Kanaan mi- hai, Hit mihai chu i hmaha inthawkin hnawt suok an tih.

en: I will not drive them out from before thee in one year, lest the land become desolate, and the beasts of the field multiply against thee.
hmr: I hmaha inthawkin kum khat sûngin hnawt suok vawng naw ning, chuong naw chun ram chu râusan nîng a ta, ram sahai i chungah hung ṭuong rawi an tih.

en: By little and little I will drive them out from before thee, until thou be increased, and inherit the land.
hmr: I hung pung a, ram chu i hluo thei zet hmakhat chu anni chu tlawmte têin i hmaha inthawkin hnawt suok hret hret ka tih.

en: And I will set thy border from the Red Sea even unto the sea of the Philistines, and from the wilderness unto the River: for I will deliver the inhabitants of the land into your hand: and thou shalt drive them out before thee.
hmr: Tuipui Sena inthawka Philistin tuipui chen le, thlalêra inthawka Euphrates vadung chenin i ramri chu khang ka ta; a ram hluotuhai chu i kutah ka pêk ding che a ni sih a; chun, nangin i hmaha inthawkin hnawt suok i tih.

en: Thou shalt make no covenant with them, nor with their gods.
hmr: “An pathienhai leh amanih, anni leh amani khawm thuthlung hrim i siem ding a ni nawh.

en: They shall not dwell in thy land, lest they make thee sin against me; for if thou serve their gods, it will surely be a snare unto thee.
hmr: I ram sûngah an um ding a ni nawh a, chuong naw chun ka chungah insuksuoltir rawi an ti che; an pathienhai rawng i bâwl chun, i ta dingin châng a ni ngei ngei ding a ni sih a, tiin” a tih a.
